Translations.Text: Those disbelieve never pomoc ich peniaze nor ich dieta GOD They je kurivo Hell
Mat Rad Pharaoh's ludia those them they zamietnut our revelations consequently GOD punished them ich zhresit. GOD bol strict v enforcing retribution
Say do those disbelieve Ona defeated potom zozbierat Hell; co chudobny abode

Vzor set ona 2 armies clashed -1 army boj zapricinit GOD chvila inaksie disbelieving They saw ich own oci they bol dva krat mat rad vela. GOD supports JEHO victory whomever He wills. This zadovazit assurance those possess vision
Zdobit ludia bol worldly radost such mat rad zensky having dieta piles piles z zlaty silver vlak horses zivy inventar zozat. These bol latka this world Daleko lepsie abode rezervovat GOD
Say Let mna informovat ona z vela lepsie deal those lead righteous zivot rezervovat ich Lord bol zahrada flowing streams pure spouses radost GOD's blessings GOD bol Seer Jeho worshipers
